title: Namecard Typefaces
content:
Hey, I’m currently doing small study on typography but i can’t seem to find much info through search engines.  
Does anyone know which types of fonts ar considered ’reliable’ & ’trustworthy’?  
Are there any fonts that are strictly for namecards only? Specially, lan gaming shop namecard & money changer namecard?

 [‹ Leopard?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203151828/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38497 "Go to previous forum topic") [Is this a good set of 'basic' typography rules? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203151828/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38542 "Go to next forum topic")
author: punkarian
